trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece conversão de várias funções e expõe um GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece conversão de várias funções e também expõe um GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: Observe que ao renderizar como escalonável vetor de elementos gráficos (SVG), uso do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>do objeto para o desenho personalizado não será incluído como parte do documento SVG.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que, por padrão, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>funções costumam ter coordenadas absolutas.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, os métodos de conversão dessa classe devem ser útil se você executar operações de desenho.

trans-unit.source: A ChartGraphics object is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ChartGraphics é exposto no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>classe? qualifyHint = False & no upgrade automático = True, o que torna mais fácil executar desenho personalizado na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se alterações significativas são feitas para o comportamento padrão da <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>do objeto, a imagem do gráfico e seus elementos associados podem ser desenhados incorretamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, posicionamento pode ser alterado.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: É altamente recomendável que você também se familiarizar com o GDI+ antes de fazer quaisquer alterações significativas para as propriedades do <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Versões não gerenciados e, opcionalmente, gerenciados recursos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> de objeto e converte suas coordenadas relativas em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> de objeto e converte suas coordenadas relativas em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto que usa as coordenadas relativas e retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto que usa as coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Usa um valor do eixo especificado para um eixo especificado e retorna o valor relativo de pixel.

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Nome da área do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"></xref> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName"> </xref> valor de enumeração que identifica o eixo relevante.

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de eixo a ser convertido em um valor relativo de pixel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o valor convertido de eixo, em coordenadas relativas de pixel.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto que usa as coordenadas absolutas e retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto que usa coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura que está usando coordenadas absolutas e retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> objeto que usa coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> estrutura em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Leva um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto absoluto coordena e retorna um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto que usa coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas absolutas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref> objeto em coordenadas relativas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um GDI+ <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto que pode ser usado para fins de desenho.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para executar qualquer desenho personalizado que pode ser executado usando GDI+.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objeto usado para desenhar.
